title: Serve One Another
itunes:title: Serve One Another
description:
In this message, Joel wants to remind you to live outward. God has put people in your life on purpose so you can be a blessing to them. Every morning, we should ask, “God, what is my assignment today? Help me see the people You want me to be good to.” ----Visit https://joelosteen.com to receive daily updates and encouragement from Joel Osteen.----Have you followed Joel Osteen on Instagram? https://instagram.com/joelosteen.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
